languages.text: If a witness does not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, that witness suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: If a witness does not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, that witness suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

languages.text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.
languages.original_text: Если к концу хода ассасина в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g} этого существа ассасина нет, оно получает урон, составляющий {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% от максимального базового урона используемого оружия ассасина.

languages.text: アサシンのターン終了時にアサシンが目撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線内{/g}に入っていない場合、この生物はアサシンの現在の武器の最大ベース{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}%ダメージを受ける。
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: アサシンのターン終了時にアサシンが目撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線内{/g}に入っていない場合、この生物はアサシンの現在の武器の最大ベース{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}%ダメージを受ける。

languages.text: Si cette créature n'a pas l'assassin dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} à la fin du tour de celui-ci, elle subit {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % des dégâts de base maximum infligés par l'arme actuelle de l'assassin.
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Si cette créature n'a pas l'assassin dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} à la fin du tour de celui-ci, elle subit {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % des dégâts de base maximum infligés par l'arme actuelle de l'assassin.

languages.text: Si esta criatura no tiene al asesino dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al final del turno del asesino, sufre un {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % del daño básico máximo del arma que tenga equipada actualmente el asesino.
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Si esta criatura no tiene al asesino dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al final del turno del asesino, sufre un {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % del daño básico máximo del arma que tenga equipada actualmente el asesino.

languages.text: 当刺客的回合结束时，若刺客不在此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内，则此生物会受到额外伤害，等同于刺客当前武器最大基础伤害的{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}%。
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客的回合结束时，若刺客不在此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内，则此生物会受到额外伤害，等同于刺客当前武器最大基础伤害的{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}%。

languages.text: Suikastçı, turunun sonunda bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunmuyorsa yaratık, Suikastçı'nın mevcut silahının verdiği maksimum taban hasarın %{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} kadarına maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Suikastçı, turunun sonunda bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunmuyorsa yaratık, Suikastçı'nın mevcut silahının verdiği maksimum taban hasarın %{uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} kadarına maruz kalır.

languages.text: Ist der Assassine am Ende seiner Runde nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} dieser Kreatur, erleidet sie {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % des maximalen Basisschadens der aktuellen Waffe des Assassinen.
languages.original_text: If this creature does not have the Assassin in its {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's turn, it suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Ist der Assassine am Ende seiner Runde nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} dieser Kreatur, erleidet sie {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85} % des maximalen Basisschadens der aktuellen Waffe des Assassinen.
